jx.jx_cn_mean: 见 be 条 be oneself, not be oneself

entry.def: A speaker or writer uses myself to refer to himself or herself. Myself is used as the object of a verb or preposition when the subject refers to the same person.
entry.tran: (用作动词或介词宾语，与句子主语指代同一个人)我自己

example.ex: I asked myself what I would have done in such a situation...
example.tran: 我问自己在这种情况下我会怎么做。

example.ex: I looked at myself in the mirror...

entry.def: You use myself to emphasize a first person singular subject. In more formal English, myself is sometimes used instead of 'me' as the object of a verb or preposition, for emphasis.
entry.tran: (用于强调第一人称单数主语)我本人，我自己

example.ex: I myself enjoy cinema, poetry, eating out and long walks...
example.tran: 我本人喜欢电影、诗歌、外出吃饭和远途散步。

entry.def: If you say something such as 'I did it myself', you are emphasizing that you did it, rather than anyone else.

example.ex: 'Where did you get that embroidery?' — 'I made it myself.'
example.tran: “你从哪儿弄到那件刺绣品的？”——“我自己绣的。”

Sentence.sentence: I don't attend services when I am there, and I have never meditated, there or anywhere; I just take walks and read and lose myself in the stillness, recalling that it is only by stepping briefly away from my wife and bosses and friends that I will have anything useful to bring to them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I myself find them rather uncomfortable to sit in for very long, but people were used to more discomfort in the past.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The work took 3 hours and I did it all myself.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I need to be by myself certainly, absolutely.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For those few hours, I can wrap myself up in my music.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: I feel like I could stay by myself until I'm 100.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I found myself filling my time up with endless work meetings and social events, rushing along as busy as a bee.

Sentence.sentence: I told myself that all experiences make you a better journalist in the long run and luckily, I was right.

Sentence.sentence: like Schwartz and so many others,I often find myself distracted and off task.

Sentence.sentence: Now, I'd like to begin by saying that I have on occasions used an interpreter myself as a foreign correspondent.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: When Tm doing something I'd rather not do, or when I'm someplace I'd rather not be, I use my phone to port myself elsewhere.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: You know, forecasting's become a very hazardous business so I don't want to commit myself too much.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English me self, from me + self (used adjectivally); the change of me to my occurred in Middle English

Sentence.sentence: After climbing up a hill for a panoramic view of the blue sea, white buildings and green olive trees, I paused to catch my breath and then positioned myself to take the best photo of this panorama.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Applying my own rule, I determined to write them in alphabetical, never letting myself leave out a tough idea.

Sentence.sentence: As the co-founder of the National Young Farmers Coalition NYFC (美国青年农会) and a family farmer myself, I have a front-row seat to the innovations among small farmers that are transforming the industry.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Determined to be myself, move forward, free of shame and worldly labels, I can now call myself a "marathon winner".

Sentence.sentence: For the first time, I feel good about myself because I'm doing something, not because someone told me I was doing good.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hearing mom say,  "I can't believe what's printed in the newspaper this morning," made me want to grab it out of her hands and read it myself.

Sentence.sentence: Here I learned my first important lesson: disabled as I was in language, I could still be smart and well express myself with clay.

Sentence.sentence: This combination of healing myself and healing the world struck me as the perfect solution.

Sentence.sentence: Yet, now that I'm growing and the world I once knew as being so simple is becoming more complex, I find myself needing a way to escape.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: However， Allen believed that the unconscious mind generates as much action as the conscious mind， and  while we may be able to sustain the illusion of control through the conscious mind alone， in reality we are continually faced with a question： “Why cannot I make myself do this or achieve that？ ”Since desire and will are damaged by the presence of thoughts that do not accord with desire， Allen concluded ： “ We do not attract what we want， but what we are.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: As for me, weighing myself every day caused me to shift my focus from being generally healthy and physically active to focusing solely on the scale.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: For these reasons, I stopped weighing myself every day and switched to a bimonthly weighing schedule instead.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: I also found that weighing myself daily did not provide an accurate  depiction of the hard work and progress I was making in the gym.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: The decision to stop weighing myself every day has done wonders for my overall health, fitness and well-being.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

sentences.en: Iaccount myself well paid.

sentences.en: I found myself in an entirely new world the moment I arrived in Beijing.

sentences.en: It's so nice to sponge myself down in a hot bath; it makes me feel so much cleaner.

sentences.cn: 这些都是我的宝贵经验, 也是对我自己的一种磨练与自我成长的方式.
sentences.en: These are my precious experiences, and it can also steel myself.

sentences.cn: 我的生活真是一团糟. 我的生活很空虚. 我的生活没有意义. 我谴责我自己.
sentences.en: LY : My life a mess. My life is empty. My life has no meaning. I blame myself.

sentences.cn: 我对扶轮社友们讲话时经常发现我自己引用其他人的话.
sentences.en: When I speak before a Rotarian audience, I often find myself quoting the words of others.

sentences.cn: 我认为我自己只是个普通的写作者.
sentences.en: I think of myself a mediocre writer.

sentences.cn: 我向来都挺文静的,不太爱说话, 所以我自己都感到意外,怎么一下子这么多话.
sentences.en: Ive always been a quiet person , chiisaikoro kara, so ive been surprising myself recently.

sentences.cn: 一旦我自己确信这个决定是正确的, 我们便动手干了起来.
sentences.en: Once I had satisfied myself that it was the right decision, we went ahead.

sentences.cn: 例:当然,我自己能开车回家.
sentences.en: You bet I can drive home myself.

sentences.cn: 让我简单介绍以下我自己.
sentences.en: Let me briefly introduce myself.

sentences.cn: 而且我必须要告诉大家: 不要担心我变得不像我自己!
sentences.en: And I want to say. Don't worry about me not being myself.

sentences.cn: 我把我自己叫作木柴断头台的参孙.
sentences.en: I call myself the Samson of the firewood guillotine.

sentences.cn: 我自己有足够多的事要做! 蜗牛说着便钻回他的窝里.
sentences.en: I have enough to do with myself! The snail goes back to his house.

sentences.cn: 有时连我自己也感惊奇.
sentences.en: You know , sometimes I amaze even myself.

sentences.cn: 我自己也要来试试.
sentences.en: I'm going to try it for myself.

sentences.cn: 绸缎商提议和我自己会一下面.
sentences.en: The mercer proposed to have a meeting with me myself.

sentences.cn: 我对书籍的热爱从未减弱,日后还引导我自己撰文著书.
sentences.en: My love of books never diminished and later led me toward writing books myself.

sentences.cn: 但愿你不要为我过于操心了, 我挺能照顾我自己.
sentences.en: I wish you would stop fussing me about. I'm quite able to look after myself.

sentences.cn: 我自己是值不得惋惜的.
sentences.en: I have no regrets for myself.

sentences.cn: 让我先先容一下我自己: 我目前在上海昂立托雅学院做英语教师.
sentences.en: Let me first introduce myself. I'm currently working as an English teacher at Shanghai Onlytoya College.

sentences.cn: 我需要向我的教练证明我自己.
sentences.en: I need to prove myself to my coach.

sentences.cn: 我觉得是被迫去做我自己不愿去做的事情.
sentences.en: I felt constrained to do what I was unwilling to do myself.

sentences.en: Would you please help me to put the shelf up; I can't do it myself.

sentences.en: Everyone, not excepting myself has the responsibility.

sentences.cn: 对不起, 我自己要用.
sentences.en: Sorry, I need it myself.

sentences.cn: 至于违背天理这个罪状, 我自己倒是很容易答辩的.
sentences.en: As to the charge of unnatural, I could easily answer it to myself.

sentences.cn: 孩子们高兴的不行了,还有啊,老实说, 我自己也挺兴奋的.
sentences.en: The kids are in seventh heaven and, frankly, I'm pretty thrilled myself.

sentences.cn: 我自己, 还有你,毕生都为此鼎力支持.
sentences.en: Myself, you have been a 20 pillar of support throughout life.

sentences.cn: 您有多少员工在您的工作室? 包括我自己在内,一共四个.
sentences.en: How many employees do you have in your workshop? are four include myself.

sentences.cn: 我要亲自去跟她说。
sentences.en: I'll speak to her myself.

sentences.cn: 我得亲自去寄这封信.
sentences.en: I have to mail the letter myself.

sentences.cn: 过几天我要到圣列奥纳德跑一趟, 亲自盘问那个女郎.
sentences.en: I will walk out of these days to St. Leonard's, and examine the girl myself.

sentences.cn: 我将亲自去征询他的意见.
sentences.en: I will make myself acquainted with his intentions and will submit to them.

sentences.cn: 谈德: 我要亲自问下上天.
sentences.en: Damdeok: I myself want to ask the heaven.

sentences.cn: 剩下我孤零零一个人了, 在这种情况下,我的好奇心油然而生,不禁想要亲自去打听些消息.
sentences.en: Left alone, under those circumstances a devouring curiosity pushed me to make some discovery for myself.

sentences.cn: 我一定得去亲自核对一下.
sentences.en: I must go and check it myself.

sentences.cn: 会的, 我经常亲自送货的.
sentences.en: Yes, I do all my deliveries myself.

sentences.cn: 我会亲自教他滑雪, 而不让他吃滑雪教练的苦头.
sentences.en: I'll teach him to ski myself, rather than leave him to the tender mercy of the skiing instructor.

sentences.cn: 我亲自到了那里之后才体会到这个国家各种问题的实际严重性.
sentences.en: I didn't realize the true seriousness of the country's problems until I went there myself.

sentences.cn: 我将亲自来安排砌砖工人.
sentences.en: I will handle the bricklayers myself.

sentences.cn: 你们准备什么时候试车? 我要亲自来参加.
sentences.en: What time are you going to try it? I want to attend the trial myself.

sentences.en: I'll executioner myself,'said the King eagerly, and he hurried off.

sentences.en: I drafted their instructions myself.

sentences.en: I purpose , therefore, to wage war myself in Wales.

sentences.cn: “ 我很乐意,索斯爵士. 我会亲自去取些水来. ”
sentences.en: " Gladly, Lord Soth. I will fetch the water myself. "

sentences.cn: 货物是经过仔细包装和装船的,在这儿完好无损,我还亲自检查过.
sentences.en: The goods were carefully packed and shipped here in excellent condition and I inspected them myself.

sentences.en: If he were here I could explain to him myself.

sentences.en: I go right along and look after that myself.

sentences.en: If only I could do the job myself.

sentences.en: I originally wanted to go myself.

sentences.en: I saw it myself.
